name: Uni Bracelet
description: Electric Red Styles Uni Bracelet is a Unisex chic and sexy bracelet for a confident funky personality. Uni Bracelet is made of gun metal, silver and gold plated for an edgy style. Uni comes in size 7 or 8 inches in length with an adjustable loop. We value making funky, fashionable products and would like to thank you for taking the moment to visit ERedStyles.com. Please be sure to tell a friend about us and come back soon!

name: Exude
description: ELECTRIC RED Styles EXUDE neck pieces are designed for the person with a passion for style. Each neck piece is handcrafted and uniquely made in limited quantities to keep our products edgy and chic for our customers. We offer handmade pieces made of man-made italian fabrics, synthetic, vegan leather, and leather for durability. Exude comes in 18-20 inches in length. We value making funky, fashionable quality products along with providing excellent customer service. We would like to thank you for taking the moment to visit ERedStyles.com. Please be sure to tell a friend about us and come back soon!

name: SHE IS...

Funk up a simple shirt with this statement piece or style it up with a fabulous dress. Either way, YOU'VE ARRIVED in a fearless way! SHE IS... is durable and comes in sizes 16,17and 18 inches in length. We value making funky, fashionable products and would like to thank you for taking the moment to visit ERedStyles.com. name: ERS Charm Bracelet
description: Electric Red Styles Golden Bronzed Charm Bracelet is a handmade personality filled bracelet with chosen charms from its red designed heart to the rockin' guitar. The ERS Golden Bronzed Bracelet is durable with 5 charms and 7 1/2 inches in length. We value making funky, fashionable quality products along with providing excellent customer service. name: Electric Red Styles Vest
description: ELECTRIC RED Styles is a brand design of vests for the person with a passion for style. Each vest and neck piece are handcrafted with attention to detail and a lining for comfort. Each piece is custom made to order in limited quantities to keep our products edgy and chic for our customers. We offer handmade vests made of man-made italian fabrics, synthetic, vegan leather, and leather with high thread counts for durability.  We value making funky, fashionable quality products to make you feel alive!
